Name: My Fake Goblin Wife
About the game: 'My Fake Goblin Wife' is a story with a place for fatal and gorgeous girls, an intriguing dramatic romance, and a distinctive visual style. It is a kinetic graphic novel. You don't have to make much effort to make your way through the story. Just enjoy reading it. Game features: Rich plot. Three heroines with their own recognizable characters. Exquisite imagery, and unique visual presentation. Definitely has a heated ending.
